trans-unit.source: Defines the behavior for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> associated with a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Definisce il comportamento per la <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> associata a un <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use WorkflowRuntimeBehavior to access the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object in your workflow service.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare WorkflowRuntimeBehavior per accedere il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>oggetto nel servizio del flusso di lavoro.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object is added by default when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> is created.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>oggetto viene aggiunto per impostazione predefinita quando il <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost>viene creato.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A> property to 10 minutes.
Not implemented in <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior"></xref>.
Not implemented.
Not implemented.
Not implemented.
Not implemented.
Configures the workflow service to support the workflow run-time behavior.
trans-unit.target: Configura il servizio del flusso di lavoro per supportare il comportamento di runtime del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A> extension and configures it for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo crea un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A>estensione e lo configura per <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A>

trans-unit.source: The service description.
The service host.
Gets or sets a value that indicates how long a workflow instance stays in-memory in the idle state before it is forcibly removed from memory.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica quanto tempo un flusso di lavoro istanza rimane in memoria nello stato di inattività prima che viene rimossa forzatamente dalla memoria.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> object indicating how long a workflow instance stays in-memory in the idle state before it is forcibly removed from memory.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.TimeSpan>oggetto che indica per quanto tempo un flusso di lavoro istanza rimane in memoria nello stato di inattività prima che viene rimossa forzatamente dalla memoria.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Verifies the scheduling service used for workflow services has been added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> object and that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> object has not started before the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.Open*>.
trans-unit.target: Verifica che il servizio di pianificazione usato per i servizi del flusso di lavoro è stato aggiunto il <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> oggetto e che il <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> oggetto non è stato avviato prima della chiamata a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.Open*>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.Open*>

trans-unit.source: The service description.
The service host.
The wrong <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService"></xref> is registered.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> associated with a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> associata a un <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object is not initialized before retrieving this property, then a new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object is created.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>prima di recuperare questa proprietà, quindi un nuovo oggetto non inizializzato <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>viene creato l'oggetto.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> object.
